topic.title: Coccidioides PHCR Relevant Dx Tests Section - conformance rules

ol.li: SHALL conform to PHCR Phcr Relevant Dx Tests Section template (templateId: 2.16.840.1.113883.10.20.15.2.3)

MAY contain zero or more [0..*] entry, such that
Contains @typeCode="DRIV" DRIV (is derived from)
Contains exactly one [1..1] Coccidioides Result Organizer (templateId: 2.16.840.1.113883.10.20.15.3.92)

SHOULD contain zero or more [0..*] entry, such that
Contains @typeCode="DRIV" DRIV (is derived from)
Contains exactly one [1..1] Coccidioides Result Observation (templateId: 2.16.840.1.113883.10.20.15.3.93)
SHALL conform to CCD Results Section template (templateId: 2.16.840.1.113883.10.20.1.14)
SHALL conform to PHCR Phcr Relevant Dx Tests Section template (templateId: 2.16.840.1.113883.10.20.15.2.3)
SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] code/@code="30954-2" Relevant diagnostic tests and/or laboratory data (CodeSystem: 2.16.840.1.113883.6.1 LOINC) (CONF-389)
SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] title = "Relevant diagnostic tests and/or laboratory data" (CONF-391)
SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] text (CONF-388, CONF:737)

MAY contain zero or more [0..*] entry (CONF:2014, CONF:2015, CONF:2016), such that
Contains @typeCode="DRIV" DRIV (is derived from)
Contains exactly one [1..1] Imaging Observation (templateId: 2.16.840.1.113883.10.20.15.3.5)

MAY contain zero or more [0..*] entry, such that
Contains @typeCode="DRIV" DRIV (is derived from)
Contains exactly one [1..1] Coccidioides Result Organizer (templateId: 2.16.840.1.113883.10.20.15.3.92)

SHOULD contain zero or more [0..*] entry, such that
Contains @typeCode="DRIV" DRIV (is derived from)
Contains exactly one [1..1] Coccidioides Result Observation (templateId: 2.16.840.1.113883.10.20.15.3.93)

SHOULD satisfy: Contains a case-insensitive language-insensitive string containing 'results'. (CONF-392)
UNIMPLEMENTABLE

p.ph: Coccidioides PHCR Relevant Dx Tests Section
